newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Bank Gdanski started.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Bank Gdanski started.

text.p: -- Caspian Securities said it started coverage of Poland's Bank Gdanski S.A. with a buy rating.

-- Analysts Damon Palmer and Petru Vaduva wrote, "With its strong regional franchise, solid retail funding base and one of the best asset quality records in Poland, Bank Gdanski is set to emerge as a regional powerhouse in Poland's rapidly growing banking sector."
-- They added, "We expect Gdansk to post strong earnings growth of roughly 22 percent and 18 percent in 1996 and 1997, respectively, in U.S. dollar terms."
